Adventure.API
Interface GameItem

All Superinterfaces:
GameObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
Item
public interface GameItem
extends GameObject

This interface is used to represent any item within the game world that the Player or a GameActor can interact with.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Firmy

          This method is used to check whether this GameItem is marked as hidden or not.

          This setter method is used to set whether this GameItem is marked as hidden or not.

Methods inherited from interface Adventure.API.GameObject
describe, description, description, name, name
 

Method Detail

weight

int weight()
This getter method gets how much this GameItem weighs. This is used to figure out how many GameItems the Player is allowed to carry.

Returns:
The weight assigned to this GameItem.

isHidden

boolean isHidden()
This is used to check if this GameItem is marked as hidden.

Returns:
True if this GameItem is marked as hidden, false otherwise.

isMovable

boolean isMovable()
This is used to check if this GameItem is marked as movable. Items that are marked as not movable can not be picked up or moved by the Player.

Returns:
True if this item is movable, false otherwise.

pickUpText

java.lang.String pickUpText()
This getter method gets the text that will be displayed to the Player when this GameItem is added to their inventory. If this GameItem is not marked as having been picked up previously by the Player, the initial pickup text is used.

Returns:
The String of text to be displayed.

pickUpText

void pickUpText(java.lang.String newPickUpText)
This setter method is used to set the text to be displayed when this GameItem is added to the player's inventory.

Parameters:
newPickUpText - The text to set as the pickup text for this GameItem.

initialPickUpText

void initialPickUpText(java.lang.String newPickUpText)
This setter method is used to set the text to be displayed when this GameItem is added to the player's inventory for the first time. It is usually a bit longer and more descriptive than the standard pickup text.

Parameters:
newPickUpText - The text to set as the initial pickup text for this GameItem.

weight

void weight(int newWeight)
This setter method is used to assign a new weight to this GameItem.

Parameters:
newWeight - The new weight to be assigned.

hidden

boolean hidden()
This method is used to check whether this GameItem is marked as hidden or not.

Returns:
True if this GameItem is marked as hidden, false otherwise.

hidden

void hidden(boolean isHidden)
This setter method is used to set whether this GameItem is marked as hidden or not.

Parameters:
isHidden - The boolean value to set this GameItem's hidden status to.

movable

void movable(boolean movability)
This setter method is used to set whether this GameItem is marked as movable or not.

Parameters:
movability - The boolean value to set this GameItem's movability to.
